name: Predicate
description: Predicate is a fast paced bullet-hell with a colorful palette and challenging bosses. Move fast and crush enemies as one character, carefully maneuver and shoot enemies as another.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core+ Memory: 100 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
